reqs:
Course offered from April 9-June 30, 2018.
Prereq: Admission to MRSc or GCR program; others require permission from the program office at info@mrsc.ubc.ca
A very important pre-course memo will be sent out by email two weeks prior to class start. If you do not receive this email 10 days prior to the start of class please contact info@mrsc.ubc.ca to receive one.
This section will be blocked from registration unless there is sufficient enrolment.
For MRSc and GCR learners only. Other students require permission from the Program Office at info@mrsc.ubc.ca.
